name: Helios Dayplanner
description: A simple task manager and planner. Build with React, NodeJS, and MongoDB with Auth0 user authentication.

name: VitX Nutrition and Fitness Tracker
description: A streamlined exercise and nutrition tracker.

name: Daniel Hathaway Woodworking
description: A React-based business site for local craftsman and carpenter Daniel Hathaway (who happens to be my father).

name: Friend Finder
description: A mock friend-matching service in which users answer a selection of questions to find the closest match in the database.

name: Train Scheduler
description: This project uses Firebase to store and modify mock train data.

name: News Project
description: Cloud Compare allows users to compare how two different news sources report on a given keyword. The results of the comparison are displayed using Highcharts word cloud.

name: GifTastic
description: GifTastic uses AJAX requests to the Giphy API to return gifs of whatever monster is selected. Users can also add their own request to the list.
